                           double newRemainingCapacity,

        newRemainingCapacity - Fraction of remaining capacity

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Name of the power source (e.g., InternalBattery-0)
        Specified by:

      • getRemainingCapacity

        public double getRemainingCapacity()
        Remaining capacity as a fraction of max capacity.
        Specified by:
        getRemainingCapacity in interface PowerSource
        Returns:
        A value between 0.0 (fully drained) and 1.0 (fully charged)

      • getTimeRemaining

        public double getTimeRemaining()
        Estimated time remaining on the power source, in seconds.
        Specified by:
        getTimeRemaining in interface PowerSource
        Returns:
        If positive, seconds remaining. If negative, -1.0 (calculating) or -2.0 (unlimited)
